actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the tenure of office of Senators and Representatives.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits a person from being eligible for election or appointment to the office of Senator for more than three full six-year terms. Prohibits a person from being eligible for election to the office of Representative for more than nine full two-year terms.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the tenure of office of Senators and Representatives.
